requirements: Prerequisites: ENAS 151 or equivalent, and knowledge of matrix-based operations.
description:
Basic theory of ordinary and partial differential equations useful in applications. First- and second-order equations, separation of variables, power series solutions, Fourier series, Laplace transforms.
Prerequisites: ENAS 151 or equivalent, and knowledge of matrix-based operations.

long_title: Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations with Applications
